root.str: The [*faction*] has captured all Amp Stations +[*points*] VP!
Earn spawn experience while inside a Reclaimed Sunderer/Galaxy/Valkyrie
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 9 shells.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 7.5%
Fire back with these lovely weapons and cosmetics!
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Forest camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 855 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Let's regroup in Sanctuary when you're free, I'll be directing our other teams until then.

This is a rapid deployment training mission, soldier. Want to get into the thick of the action? We've given you a free pass to the front lines. Press your "Join Combat" key ("J" by default) to enable a rapid deployment into contested territory. There is a limit to how often we can deploy you to the front this way, so use it to get to new battles if the fighting nearby has simmered down, or to reach a new location if you're severely outnumbered in your current combat area.

Recent developments in shielding technology have enabled further investigation of the ancient superstructure revealed during the Shattering. Foster has requested that you venture into the heart of The Shattered Warpgate to determine the source of an energy signature that seems to be hastening the deterioration of the lattice network beneath Esamir.
I need someone to man this gun!
Destroy the Shield Console in the Isolation Tank Lab
Customize your Flash with this yellow blinking antenna ball. VS use only.
Allows the player to carry two additional magazines.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Forest Armor Camo

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> There are also notes on nearby locations. Underwater shrines? They are listed as giving off an unusual energy signature. Anything of Vanu origin is worth investigating. I have marked their positions on your map.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140 rockets.
The occupant has declined to swap seats.
There are no skill sets for this category...
This customization adds a Dark Red decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Earn points by holding Auraxis Firearms Corp, Crux Headquarters, The Bastion, Rockslide Outlook, LithCorp Central, or Raven Landing.
Applies a decal to your armor.
An electrical storm that was roaming the continent has now dissipated.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley</font> You see those glowing plants around The Shattered Warpgate? The Board has some interest in them for medical purposes, maybe?
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Killing a vehicle within 30 meters restores one tick of ammunition for you or your vehicle. <font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles.</font>
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Leaf Camo
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
When your shield is broken, you gain 15% of your maximum ability energy. This action can only occur once every 12 seconds.
Standard Terran Republic Light Assault Helmet
Apply the Petal camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 shells.
Further improve the Prowler's maximum forward speed and acceleration.
Ordnance Armor reduces the amount of damage taken from explosions.
TR - Auto-Pistol - Mid - V2 Description(Delete Me -BB)

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I can't believe the Terran Republic really thought they'd be able to win the war that way. I don't expect much, but the datapad will be delivered to our scientists to see what they can come up with.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Are you sure you want to Warp to another Continent?

Displays the target's health bar while spotted, increases crosshair IFF detection range, and increases hold breath duration by 200%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. Works in vehicles.</font>

Deploy a pod of 7 recon drones where each drone can detect infantry at a 50 meter radius. Once in position the drones will spread out to cover a roughly 100 meter area. Enemies can shoot down the drones.
Applies a cosmetic attachment to your vehicle. NC only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 800 rounds.
Having a rough day? Try a new class or experiment with a new playstyle!
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Adds 3 grenades to the default magazine size.
The annual Halloween event has begun! Take a free mask and start collecting pumpkin seeds!
Controls the Bloom shader effect. Default is on.
The A30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.
Allows cortium to be used to create a tower structure that can be used by infantry units. TR use only.
Got a visual on an enemy vehicle!
Increases the size of the ANT's Cortium storage cell.
VS - MAX - Flak Burster - V3 Description
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Sunderer by 25%.
Increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 1 standard size magazine.
Your account has been suspended for 3 days.
The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.
Regenerate health at all times, but receive more damage from incoming fire.
In VR you do not need to spend certs or DB in order to gain access to equipment and upgrades! Any purchases in VR are permanent! Are you sure you want to proceed?
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 125 rounds.
Your request is unable to be processed at this time. Please try again later.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 40%.
TR Multi Rocket Launcher - Test Weapon
Increases the lock on range of the missile launcher by 16 meters.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Enemy infantry and MAX units within 2 meters of you receive 15% more damage when attacked from the rear.
Medic: Kill 10 medics trying to revive
I've got an idea! If we could lock the other factions out of Esamir, that would allow us to finish our work and stop them from doing the same.
Adds yellow chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. TR use only.
This player is freelancing and has limited outfit communication. See the help screen for more info.
艾美瑞什 Forest v2 Camo

Unlocks the Insulated Suit on all infantry classes. Electrical Storms no longer wreak havoc on your personal shield, and lightning damage reduced by 50%.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Reduces the rate of decay on your overshield by 50% while stationary, and 25% while moving. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Apply the single use Scrub Forest camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adds white chassis lights to the under carriage of the Lightning. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner</font> A melee weapon is needed to sever the glowing core from the rest of the plant, this is the portion you must deliver to us for study.

Replaces 20% of the Vanguard's health with a fast regenerating shield layer. This shield has a 6 second recharge delay upon receiving damage, and a 15 second delay when broken. Regenerates 100 shield health per second.
Increases the speed at which your shields recharge to full by 50%, and reduces the delay before your shield begins recharging by 1 second.
Earn spawn experience from your Deliverer Prototype in a contested area
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 7 rockets.
This customization adds a Grey75 decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Depending on the weapon, increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 2 or 4 standard size magazines.
Increases turbo fuel regeneration rate. An empty fuel tank will refill completely in 15 seconds.
This customization changes the color of the cockpit glass to Olive.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.

A weighted version of the standard Frag Grenade which bounces less and inflicts the same damage on enemy infantry.

3 second fuse.
Reduces cooldown of Spitfire Auto-Turret by 15 seconds.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 4 KPH.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Flash by 30 seconds.
Keep moving! Many sniper rifles can kill in one shot to the head. Standing still for too long usually results in death.
Apply the Lightning Strike camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Apply the single use Northern Forest camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
This 4th Anniversary Edition of the Parallax VX3 is a heavy-hitting, high velocity sniper rifle, allowing for easy long distance shots. VS use only.
Apply the Stripe camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Adds cosmetic plating to your Sunderer. NC use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 rounds.
Damage from impacts striking the top of the Vanguard are reduced by an additional 10%.
Illuminate the battlefield with these front-facing Fogbreach Headlights for your Sunderer. VS only.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.

Control territory and slay enemies to lock Hossin

Trades 100 Auraxium for 10 Synthium.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.

USE
From the map screen Right-click on a facility to install this module.

DESCRIPTION
Phalanx turrets at the facility gain infrared zoom optics and can fire for longer before overheating.

Each craft will produce 5 of this module.

Lasts 20 minutes. Additional modules of this type increase the duration 20 minutes up to a max of 60 minutes.
NC Patriot Flare Gun Silver Medal
Sunderers and ANTs cost 30% less nanites when pulled from this facility.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> A gift for this drone? On the nose. And it glows! Merry Auraximas to all! And to all a good night!
This customization adds a Dark Purple decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Contains a NS Decimator plus 1000 Certs
Icarus Jump Jets provide significantly faster vertical thrust and fuel recharge rate at the cost of in-air maneuverability and overall fuel capacity.
The Banjo mid-range optic allows for quick target acquisition with a high-contrast crosshair reticle, and 3.4x zoom depth.
This gold-trimmed full helmet is awarded for completion of the Exceptional V directive.
Upon being revived, damage taken is reduced by 20% for 3.5 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> And to top it all off you were instrumental in bringing the Containment Sites online and were even able to establish a cyclical connection to the Desolation asteroid with enough resources to keep us on full-auto for years to come. Now get back to the front lines. That's an order!
Adds 14 rounds to the default magazine size.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Regenerates 20 health per second when out of combat for 10 seconds.

USE
Claim rewards from Coordinator Tolland on Sanctuary.

DESCRIPTION
Requires Expedition Asset crafting permissions.

Charter an expedition to gather 150 Synthium for your Outfit Armory.

Only ONE resource expedition may be active at a time.
This is where the enemy can change their armor and load outs
You must empower Fatestealer in order to get Nightshade. To do this, you must find a way to imbue the weapon with acidic potency.
Increases how much cortium the vehicle has when it is spawned.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.

Red Lumifiber Tiger Trim for the Valkyrie. TR use only.
Activate to disrupt lock-on attempts and missiles tracking the vehicle for 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 27 seconds.
Apply the Thorn camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.

Infiltrators can cloak to blend into their surroundings and become near invisible. Cloaking is toggled with the ability key. The cloak is more effective while motionless, and most effective while crouching. Cloak can be revealed when lit with a Darklight (an attachment found on many weapons). Infiltrators have slightly reduced shield capacity compared to other infantry.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> That drone is toast, but we should be able to send an away team to retrieve it once the fighting on Esamir has calmed down a bit.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Customize your Galaxy with these sleek Razor Fins. VS use only.
VS's Light A. Baron GOLD Description
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Bends light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Cloak lasts for up to 12 seconds, and regenerates to full in 7 seconds.
When activated, the Fire Suppression System will repair damage for 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the fire.
Earned when a squadmate deploys directly into your Sunderer (requires you to be in it).
Nanite based tool specialized to harvest Auraxium.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180 rounds.
Further reduces the reuse timer of the EMP Spiker.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Reduces the duration which Concussion and Flash Grenades affect you by 90%.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Star Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.

The Cortium Tap greatly decreases the Cortium cost to maintain powered objects. Additionally, ANT's can unload Cortium at a Tap which is then transferred directly to the silo; with a 10,000 Cortium capacity it can also act as additional storage when the base silo is full.

Must be placed at least 135 meters away and no more than 155 meters away from a Silo for the efficiency buff; the buff can stack up to three times.
Allows use of the mid-range 4x TrueShot scope.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, renders nearby structures nearly indestructible thanks to lightning-fast repairs. NC use only.
Apply the Desert Scrub v2 camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
The weapon now fires a singular slug with increased velocity and damage, but hipfire cone of fire increases by 50%.
Allies who are below 100 health passively heal for 15 health per second while you are within 7 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Apply the single use Indar Rock camo pattern to your armor.
Select a credit card from on file, or add a new card to your account.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Combat Medic. TR use only.
Small fortified structure that can provide cover for both infantry and deployed equipment.

The Colossus Update brings with it new weapons and technology at every level of play.

  • Enter: Colossus, a massive, 5-seated heavy tank capable of destroying Bastion Fleet Carriers from the ground.
  • The Outfit Armory has received updates in the form of Facility Modules that bolster the strength of allied bases.
  • Soldiers can arm themselves with the new NS-66 Punisher, an advanced close-quarters SMG with a built-in underbarrel launcher.
When activated, will repair the MAX slowly over time.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 grenades.

Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.

Change the quality of particles that are drawn far away.
Increases the lock-on range of the weapon by 10 meters.

This Rocklet is armed with variable Armor Piercing and Sensor Jamming capabilities. Sensor Jammers prevent nearby allies from being spotted by detection devices.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 240 rounds.
Esamir Munition Corporation's EM1 LMG is a unique mix of high ammo count and fast reloading time, allowing the shooter to control firing lanes with little downtime. NC use only.

These alien shards are held in place with a psykinetic link channeled through the gauntlet. This weapon was re-created from Briggs' original design, constructed after his mind-altering encounter with an ancient Vanu artifact.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Attaches a 2.25x optical zoom to your weapon.
Increases resource gain by 30% and squad resource gain by 3% for 1 Day. Boost can only be used on this character.

When equipped, the recharge delay for damaged Personal Shields will be reduced by .8 seconds.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rockets.

While your personal shield is active, receiving small arms or common explosive damage now heals 50 health immediately. Both damage types have independent cooldowns, and each effect may only trigger once every 4 seconds.
Cortium levels at zero. Decay beginning.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 rounds.
Wraps your Vanguard in an obsidian trim. NC use only.
Slows and disorients enemies within its blast radius.
The Amp Station benefit increases the cooling capabilities of Phalanx turrets, allowing them to fire more often.

Ambusher Jump Jets provide a quick burst of forward thrust, with limited vertical height and a 6.5 second cooldown between uses.
Increases afterburner fuel replenishment rate by 70% and afterburner fuel capacity by 80%.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Lightning by 15%.
Silo Reserved, Light Vehicle Terminal Unavailable.
Promotional Daybreak Cash offers are available!
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Our scanners indicate you've successfully retrieved one of our vehicles. Please continue, our technology must not fall into the wrong hands.
Originally developed as a stationary turret, the MAX-mounted, multi-barreled M1 Heavy Cycler is capable of shredding apart entire squads without needing to reload. TR use only.

The Lancer VS22's particle accelerator is capable of firing a focused, high-velocity anti-armor projectile with pinpoint accuracy. The weapon has three charge-levels which increases damage and ammunition used. VS use only.
Improves the ability of the Harasser to dart in and out of combat and line up targets by improving traction, turning rate, brakes, and reverse speed.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Viridian Genetics was performing experiments on people. Human augmentation! Not even the Vanu Sovereignty could justify the things they were doing here. But there may be some usable data.
Reduces damage taken from C4, Infantry Launchers, and Air to Ground Warheads by 10%.

Collects your haul from the latest Polystellarite expedition.
Contains 15 Polystellarite.
Deploy a powerful cortium bomb that will explode after 20 seconds, doing high damage over a large radius. Detonation is cancelled if destroyed before the timer expires. Can only deploy outside.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Magrider by 5%.
The Promise LMG's large magazine and high rate of fire are complemented by in-built counterweights for sustained accuracy. NC use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.375 seconds.
Roll out in style with this custom rail guard for your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Whenever you receive damage, 8% of your maximum jump jet fuel is restored. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
You have not agreed to our User Agreement, therefore you are unable to purchase items.

There are several continents to conquer on Auraxis. Each continent has a unique geography, facilities, and combat style. Warpgate Terminals allow transportation between these continents.Follow your waypoint to the Warpgate Terminal.

Nanite Systems hasn't let the trade secret of what causes the color of Skull Noir's unholy black flames, but anonymous sources have indicated it may very well be related to nanites. Provides a +15% xp bonus when worn during the annual Halloween Event.
Increases the vehicles ability to brake quickly
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 11.25%
Medical and Restoration Kits can be used to heal you when no Combat Medics are nearby.
The Sunderer acts as a troop transport, and can be deployed to become a spawn point for your allies.
While piloting a vehicle, that vehicle becomes capable of spawning squadmates directly into it if there is an open seat.<font color="#dc9c36"> Does not apply to Bastion Fleet Carriers.</font>
Reduce the acquire timer for pulling this vehicle.

Sets the opacity of the HUD chat window when it is not actively being used or updated. By default, it is set to be 0% ( fully transparent ).

Confined areas are prime targets for grenades and other explosives. Be cautious!

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> An ANT is more than a tool for sucking up Cortium. You can use it to flatten zealots and corporate rejects, too! Take out a few enemies instead and I'll pay you for your time.

Squad leaders have access to a squad spawn beacon that allows you to deploy via drop pod to that location.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 2% every 1 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Supply Coordinator:</font> I've just received confirmation of your arrival. Good run, soldier.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.

Horizon's experimental design fires a fan of three projectiles on a horizontal trajectory when hipfiring, and a tighter, vertical trajectory when aiming. Each plasma projection packs less firepower than the average carbine individually, but when all projections land, the stopping power rivals that of harder hitting weapons. VS use only.
Adds flaming trails to the vehicle's wheels. All factions can use this gear.

Unlock consumable items for the Heavy Assault's utility slot. Utility items can be equipped on the loadout screen.

Coated in an advanced alloy that allows it to navigate harsh weather with ease, the Stormglider Drone was originally created by Nanite Systems to collect atmospheric readings on newly terraformed worlds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.12 seconds.

This is an Infiltrator training mission, soldier. With the Infiltrator class, assist your team by deploying your recon tool to detect enemies, marking them so they can be easily eliminated by your teammates. Your Hunter Cloaking ability will allow you to sneak into enemy bases and hack their terminals and turrets, allowing your team to utilize them when pushing into enemy bases. Your cloak doesn't make you completely invisible, so be stealthy and pick your targets wisely.
Regenerates 23 health per second when out of combat for 10 seconds.
